Title: Illusion Beaded Evening Dress

Featured-image: CP805-white-illusion-beaded-evening-dress_p.jpg

Description: A-line gown covered in bead work that sparkles on the dress. The sheer neckline is adorned with sparkling rhinestones and sequins. The back is in a V-neck style. The sides of the gown are sheer with a nude underlying fabric and swirling beadwork.
